data.name: Slider Quest
data.detailed_description:
Update 1

The 1st major update for Slider Quest has gone live. While the game is in early access I have added an Early Access section in game so you can try out the newest levels, features and puzzles without having to go through the main game. This way only the most popular additions make it into the final game. For this 1st update I have added an artificial locomotion for those that don't like teleporting. I've also included a photo realistic wild west world with three levels to try out. This is to see would people prefer a realistic world to a cartoony one. You can still try out this world using a new teleporting system by pressing the shoulder button and bringing up a menu. In the main game I have fixed a number of bugs and added graphics that show which direction restricted blocks can move. Future updates will include new puzzles to try out. A beautiful woman to act as a guide in the game. A story mode to tie the game together and some kind of reward system for progressing through the levels be it a high score or upgrades.


About the Game

Slider Quest is an immersive puzzler with over 40 levels designed exclusively for Virtual Reality. Just as you would in real life, use your hands to grab and move objects around the virtual world as you help guide the ball to the basket. Move blocks and panels to create a path for the ball to follow. Pick up that bow and arrow to shoot down swinging pendulums that might be blocking the way. Grab that hammer that can bust trap doors open. Feel the power as you hold the fire sword and swing away. If that is not enough there are five end of world bosses you have to defeat using your wit and cunning to move onto the next part of the game.
